description: Re-siting of payphone kiosk to outside no. 293 Hornsey Road.
decision_conditions:
INFORMATIVES 

 1. The floor of the payphone should be level with the surrounding footway, paved to match the footway paving materials and bonded into the existing paving pattern. 

 2. Please ensure that site supervisors refer to the Council's guidance notes on payphone installation to ensure a high quality finish and a satisfactory relationship to existing street furniture. 

 3. For all matters relating to existing street furniture, paving and installation details, contact Roger Estop 477 2267. 

 4. Please ensure all excavation near tree roots is carried out by hand to avoid cutting tree roots. For matters relating to street trees contact Vincent James 477 3878. 

 5. If you have any queries about statutory services, contact the relevant statutory undertaker direct. 

 6. Please ensure that the payphone is regularly and effecticely cleaned in the interests of streetscene appearance.
